text.1: Bringing over two decades of expertise to the realm of international freight transport,
text.2: LKW-ALEKS Spedition stands as your reliable choice for streamlined and secure transportation solutions.
text.3: Discover our top-notch services and the robust partnerships we build with our clients!

aboutus.subtitle: About Us
aboutus.title: A Legacy of Excellence and Achievement
aboutus.text: Established in 2002, LKW-ALEKS Spedition is a devoted company offering an extensive range of transportation and logistics services, designed to meet the diverse and demanding needs of the business landscape. With over two decades of experience in a rapidly changing business environment, our commitment has always been to promptly cater to our clients, providing them with flexibility, professionalism, and top-notch service quality.

services.subtitle: Our Services
services.title: Customized Solutions for Every Demand
services.text: LKW-ALEKS Spedition offers a diverse range of integrated storage, distribution, and transportation solutions worldwide, swiftly and affordably!

1.title: International Road Transport
1.text: We specialize in groupage and exclusive road transportation, covering a wide range of weights from 10 kg to 23,000 kg. Our services extend to numerous destinations across Europe and Asia, including but not limited to Portugal, Spain, France, England, Belgium, the Netherlands, Germany, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, Italy, Switzerland, Austria, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Hungary, Bulgaria, Slovenia, Croatia, Serbia, Turkey, Ukraine, Russia, Romania, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, Kyrgyzstan, Armenia, Georgia, and more.

2.title: General Cargo Transportation
2.text: General cargo transportation provides a versatile and flexible solution for goods that do not require special handling or storage conditions. We transport general cargo using various standard vehicles such as curtain-sided trucks, vans, lorries, or dump trucks. The diversity of our fleet allows us to select the most suitable option based on the specific needs of each client.

3.title: Dangerous Goods Transportation (ADR)
3.text: Dangerous goods, as defined by the ADR Convention, encompass substances and objects that, due to their physical, chemical, or biological characteristics, pose significant risks to health, safety, and the environment. Transporting hazardous goods requires special attention and specialized approaches. We understand the importance of ensuring a safe transport process, managing each shipment responsibly and professionally.

4.title: Heavy Cargo Transportation
4.text: Heavy cargo transportation is the ideal solution when goods exceed the standard size or weight limits associated with regular road transport. Regardless of the type of cargo, our team of specialists identifies the right route and selects the ideal truck to ensure the success of each transport.

5.title: Refrigerated Transport
5.text: We offer comprehensive refrigerated transport services for frozen and perishable goods, maintaining controlled temperatures between -18°C and 20°C. Equipped with cutting-edge technology, our trucks feature advanced temperature control systems, ensuring the integrity of products from the point of departure to the destination.

6.title: Logistics Services
6.text: We provide not only transportation services but also a complete range of auxiliary services to facilitate and optimize your entire logistics chain. These include storage, internal or cross-border distribution of goods, and intermediation in customs formalities. Emphasizing quality and efficiency, our priority is to offer comprehensive and personalized solutions for every aspect of logistics.

whyus.subtitle: WHY US?
whyus.title: Why us? Factors that Set Us Apart

1.title: Integrated Logistics
1.text: We provide comprehensive logistics solutions, efficiently managing every stage of the transportation process. From storage to distribution and real-time tracking, we offer transparency and complete control.

2.title: Punctuality
2.text: In the business world, every second matters. We place a special emphasis on punctuality, ensuring your goods reach their destination on time, every time.

3.title: Continuous Support
3.text: We offer personalized support to ensure a seamless transportation experience and effective communication at every stage.

4.title: Modern Fleet
4.text: Benefit from our services with a fleet equipped with state-of-the-art technology to ensure the safety and efficiency of transportation.

5.title: Customized Solutions
5.text: We adapt to your specific needs, providing personalized and flexible solutions to meet your transportation requirements.

6.title: Experience and Professionalism
6.text: With a presence of over two decades in the industry, we have the expertise needed to successfully manage any type of international transport.

certificates.subtitle: Certificates
certificates.title: Licenses and Certificates
certificates.text: We pride ourselves on our commitment to the highest standards of quality and legal compliance. Below, we present our certificates and licenses that attest to our professionalism and dedication to providing international transport and logistics services.

1.text: We turned to LKW-ALEKS Spedition for our general goods transport, and their service was exceptional. Prompt deliveries, careful handling of our products, and a professional team make them our preferred logistics partner.

2.text: LKW-ALEKS Spedition played a significant role in managing our bulk transport needs. From precise loading to on-time deliveries, their commitment to efficiency and reliability sets them apart in the logistics industry.

3.text: Partnership with LKW-ALEKS Spedition for comprehensive logistics services has optimized our entire supply chain. Their solutions from storage to distribution have streamlined our operations and improved overall efficiency.

4.text: Maintaining the integrity of our temperature-sensitive products is crucial. Their refrigerated transport service has consistently delivered on the promise to preserve the quality of our products throughout the journey.

1.question: What destinations are covered by LKW-ALEKS Spedition services?
1.answer: We offer competitive freight transport rates with full trucks for both export and import to and from countries such as Portugal, Spain, France, England, Belgium, Netherlands, Germany, Denmark, Sweden, Norway, Finland, Lithuania, Latvia, Estonia, Italy, Switzerland, Austria, Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Hungary, Bulgaria, Slovenia, Croatia, Serbia, Turkey, Ukraine, Russia, Romania, Kazakhstan, Turkmenistan, Kyrgyzstan, Armenia, Georgia, and more.

2.question: How can I get a customized offer?
2.answer: To get a customized offer, contact us by phone at +373 69 150 150 or +373 69 150 151 or by email at info@lkw-aleks.com, and our team will provide personalized consultancy, identifying the most suitable solutions for your requirements.

3.question: What international conventions does LKW-ALEKS Spedition use for executing transports?
3.answer: We execute transports based on the international conventions CMR (Convention on the Contract for the International Carriage of Goods by Road) and TIR (Customs Convention on the International Transport of Goods under Cover of TIR Carnets).

4.question: What are the advantages of long-term collaboration with LKW-ALEKS Spedition?
4.answer: Long-term collaboration with us brings benefits such as competitive rates, priority in offered services, access to exclusive facilities, and specialized consultancy for continuous optimization of the logistics chain.

company.text: We offer international transport and groupage and exclusive expedition services (from 10kg to 23,000kg). Contact us now to find out how we can support your business.
